title: Interpretation of seeing a blade in a dream

preview.html: I likeFansSubscribersFans Interpretation of a dream about a blade in a dream. A blade is a sharp tool used for shaving and other purposes. Seeing a blade in a dream has many interpretations that vary depending on the situation in which you see the blade, whether it is sharp or broken. In this article, we will give you all possible interpretations of seeing the blade in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a tree in a dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a razor blade in a dream, and it has many interpretations, as seeing a sharp blade indicates the annoying words that come out of the dreamer’s mouth. Seeing a blade in a dream can be a sign of someone who possesses great wealth in a dream. And whoever holds the blade of his pen. It indicates that God will bless you with the birth of a boy, improve his education, and become of high and good morals, and people will envy you for him. Seeing a blade in a man’s dream could be a sign of returning to his wife after a long quarrel and separation. Seeing someone holding a razor blade. Anyone who sees a blade in a dream, this dream indicates To get rid of the worries, sorrows and problems that he suffers from in his life. He is holding a razor and is suffering from turmoil and instability in his life. This dream indicates stability in life and coverage and that he will enjoy peace of mind. And seeing a clean razor. There is no hair in the dream is evidence of success and growth in his life. The evil of seeing a razor blade: Seeing a rusty razor blade is evidence of problems and punishments that the dreamer has experienced in his life, and many of his works will be disrupted as a result of many obstacles. Since the blade is not sharp and unfit in the dream, this is evidence that you are not free from problems and obstacles in life. Interpretation of seeing a blade Broken in a dream: Anyone who sees a broken razor blade in a dream, this indicates ambiguity and lack of clarity about the goals he pursues in life and the inability to control the goals of his pursuit. Interpretation of seeing the blade in a dream: The symbol indicates problems and disagreements between the fortuneteller and the people around him. Anyone who cuts With a blade in a dream is a sign of loss and failure in his life, his inability to fulfill his desires and his inability to complete tasks and tasks. Whoever argues with someone using a blade, this indicates that the dreamer will suffer a great loss in his work and his inability to complete tasks. Interpretation of seeing a blade in Dream: An unmarried woman who sees a blade in a dream indicates the presence of a tyrannical and tyrannical person. It may be evidence of many jealous people. Interpretation of seeing a blade in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees a blade in a dream indicates many problems, worries, and heartaches that she suffers from in a dream. Her life. Seeing blood flowing from a blade wound could be a sign of divorce. Whoever swallows foam in a dream, this indicates the strength of his patience. Interpretation of seeing a blade in a pregnant woman’s dream: A pregnant woman who sees a blade in a dream indicates that the birth will be easy and God will bless her with the birth of a boy. Therefore, we offer you all possible interpretations of seeing a blade or razor in a dream. For those who have a vision and want to explain it, we welcome your comments at the end of the article via the Sham website.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a house fire and escaping from it in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a house fire and escaping from it in a dream, as it is one of the most disturbing dreams that can tempt many people, and it is noteworthy that fires are usually unpleasant, according to what scholars narrated. From interpretation, the vision may indicate good news. For the fortune teller, the interpretation followed by scholars in interpreting dreams according to the social status of the viewer, along with the symbols and hints present in the dream, and in our article we will learn about the interpretation of the dream of a house fire and its survival in a dream.Interpretation of a dream of a house fire and surviving it in a dreamIt is possible that the interpretation of a dream of a fire in a house is Escaping from it is one of the good dreams that do not indicate evil, but it is possible for the dream to carry a bad omen and evil, and this is reflected in the dreamer’s life. In the following lines we present the most important interpretations, among which are: Many interpreters saw that seeing a fire in someone’s house, but it He survived the success of the fortuneteller in his life, and some said that this is a sign of good financial condition or that the dream indicates the end of problems or difficulties that exist between the dreamer’s family, and God Almighty knows best. Also, the interpretation of this dream for someone suffering from an illness is good news from God Almighty for a speedy recovery, Some say that this vision shows the blessing that will come to the owners of this house, and God knows best. Then there are some scholars that seeing a person in the middle of fire without being affected by it, like our master Abraham, peace be upon him, is a sign of good morals. See also: Interpretation of dreams for the dead asking for something In a dream, interpretation of dreams about fire and extinguishing in the house, we present to you a set of indicators and interpretations related to dreaming about fire and extinguishing it in the house, as this depends on the social status of the dreamer, in addition to the circumstances he is going through in real life: The interpretation of seeing fire in the house in a dream and fire was to the point that it reached... The sky, so the dream indicates that the owners of this house are committing many sins and they must repent and return to God Almighty. The interpretation of a person seeing that his clothes are burning is that this is an unpleasant thing that befalls him and he must give charity so that no harm befalls him. We also find that seeing burning fires without smoke or sounds It indicates a feeling of security, and when a person sees this fire reaching him, this is a sign that there are some relatives who are following him. A dream about a person like Abraham, peace be upon him, who is in hell, but the fire does not harm him, indicates that this person has good morals and that God Almighty will grant him victory over his enemies. And all his troubles will do. And God knows best. A fire in the house is a sign of discord in a person’s life, or it may be a sign of a problem facing the owners of the house, but if the fire is in the middle of the house, and the person is using it, either for propaganda or heating, it indicates the death of the owner of the house. As for the fire The one in which there is no smoke indicates performing the Hajj obligation in the same year, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a house fire for one girl: An unmarried woman dreams of a group of different dreams and visions, as seeing a fire in the house carries a number of interpretations.

preview.html: Something that causes tension and turmoil in this dream is to interpret this dream, and therefore we will tell you through our article today the interpretation of the dream of the appearance of acne by Ibn Sirin and the leading scholars of interpretation.Interpretation of the dream of the appearance of acne in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of the appearance of pimples on the face in a dream. Among the most prominent interpretations mentioned by Ibn Sirin are the following: The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of acne appearing on the face in a dream, as a sign of blessings and abundant nourishment, God willing. This dream may also indicate that you hear happy news in reality. If he sees it in his sleep That his face is full of acne. This shows relief and upcoming happiness. But if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is sitting with a group of people and his face is full of acne. And that everyone present is disturbed by the appearance of these pimples. This indicates that the divine will soon hear good news and celebrate with them. These people. As the scholar Ibn Sirin says, the appearance of acne in a dream indicates the approaching Gulf and the death of sorrows, God willing. But if the dreamer sees these pimples in a dream that they are black and fill his entire face, then this indicates adversity and misfortunes. Black and brown pimples in a dream indicate Many sorrows. It also indicates that the dreamer is suffering from a bad psychological state. This dream may also indicate that the dreamer has a bad reputation and has rude morals. See also: Interpretation of seeing insects on the body in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about pimples appearing on the face of an unmarried girl. Acne is one of The most annoying things for teenage girls. Therefore, this dream is considered one of the most disturbing dreams for many girls, and they want to know its interpretation. Here is the interpretation of the dream as follows: The scholars and interpreters said that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she suffers from acne on her face, this indicates that she will be happy soon, and God Almighty will give her a good husband, because acne here indicates puberty. If a girl sees herself in a dream, she suffers from acne on her face. She is in school, which means that she will excel in her studies and succeed, God willing. A dream about acne spreading on the face of an unmarried girl indicates the proximity of relief and hearing happy news. If she sees an unmarried girl Married in her dream, her face is full of acne and she is about to find a new job. This indicates that this girl will get this job soon. If this girl dreams of traveling abroad and she dreams of this dream. This indicates that he will succeed in traveling and travel abroad But if a girl sees herself, her face is full of black spots. Unfortunately, this indicates the emergence of some problems and obstacles in this girl’s life. Interpretation of a dream about pimples appearing in a dream on the back. There are many interpretations of a dream about acne appearing on the back, and the most important of these interpretations are the following: If the dreamer sees in his dream that his back has been sown with grains, this usually indicates that this person will receive a lot of money soon. If the merchant sees in his dream that his back has been sown with grains, this usually indicates that he will win a lot.

title: Interpretation of a dream about my sister who loves my husband in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that my sister loves my husband in a dream If you are looking for an interpretation of a dream that my sister loves my husband in a dream, we present to you below the interpretations of scholars and translators, all of this and more...Interpretation of a dream about my sister who loves my husband in a dream Interpretation of a dream about my sister who loves my husband in a dream may indicate On the husband’s preoccupation with worldly matters, and God knows the unseen, as the husband may express his interest in the world and his lack of interest in the path of truth, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees in a dream that the sister loves her husband, this may lead to disagreements with her husband, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It may also indicate the husband’s dealings with his wife, And God knows best what is not seen. Interpretation of a dream about my sister Naima in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister Naima in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this. However, seeing sleep in a dream could be a sign of neglect, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a young man sees himself sleeping in a dream, it may express asceticism and renunciation from the world. And God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself sleeping in a dream, this may indicate unemployment and lack of work, and God knows everything that is not seen. Interpretation of a dream about my sister, Nifas, in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister, Nifas, in a dream. If a married woman sees a visit from an unmarried sister, who is Nifas, it may represent an intimate marriage, by God. The highest and most knowledgeable is because seeing an unmarried woman after giving birth in a dream can symbolize marriage, God willing. If a married woman sees herself in a dream after giving birth, this may be a sign of exhaustion and weakness, and God knows all that we did not see. If a woman sees that she is postpartum after the postpartum period has ended, she can She expresses her concern for herself in the coming period, and God knows best. If a married woman sees childbirth in a dream, she may express a mood of sadness and depression, and God knows all that is not seen. title: Learn about the interpretation of fear of cats in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Fear of cats in a dream can be interpreted with many interpretations and gossip of various interpreting researchers, and the final interpretation of the dream is determined according to many things, the most important of which is the state of seeing cats. Or trying to keep them away from them and attack them, and the interpretation is also affected by the nature of the fortune teller and whether he is male or female. Fear of cats in a dream Fear of cats in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is surrounded by many conspiracies and conspiracies and he must be careful not to lose. Scratching cats in a dream means that the enemies who are conspiring against him may succeed in getting rid of him, and God knows best. The interpretation of a dream of fear of cats also indicates the possibility of betrayal by people close to him, and here he must recalculate his various relationships before being exposed to betrayal. Fear of cats in a dream by Ibn Sirin The reason for fear of cats in a dream may be that they are predatory cats, and here Ibn Sirin interprets the dream as saying that the dreamer has some enemies who are trying to harm him, and therefore he must be careful, either in his country. Personal relationships or at work, so as not to fall victim to them and lose many valuable things. Ibn Sirin believes that the dream of fear of cats may indicate the abandonment of the seer, so the girl he loves leaves him, which causes him some sadness and psychological pain that will disappear with time, only he must try to return to his normal life and we ask God Almighty to be patient with him. Fear of cats in a single person's dream Fear of cats in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of the presence of some harmful people in the fortuneteller's life and that they are constantly planning to destroy them and destroy their life path, so everyone around them must always be careful with them, and they must also ask God Almighty to save them from all harm and misfortunes. The dream of fear of cats may involve the girl trying to escape from them, and here the interpreters see that the dream symbolizes the dreamer's fear of losing her future or her anxiety about not being able to reach what she wants. Here, scholars advise the necessity of diligence, reliance on God, and continuing to pray to Him, so that you can get everything you want soon. As for the interpretation of seeing fear of cats and trying to overcome this fear for a single woman, this indicates that the fortuneteller will be able to succeed in her future life and that she will get a lot of money, which will make many things easier for her and will help her achieve prosperity. Fear of cats in a dream for a married woman Scholars interpret the fear of cats in a dream for a married woman as being surrounded by many evil people who are trying to destroy her life, and here the dream is a warning to her to stay away from these people and focus on her life more in the coming period. The dream of fear of cats also symbolizes the dreamer's suffering from many disagreements and problems with her husband, which causes her a lot of psychological pressure, and here she must stop arguing with her husband and try to solve her affairs wisely until he finds her. Her again. Psychological stability and congratulates her on

title: Thunder in a dream / Interpretation of a dream about thunder by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Thunder in a dream indicates intimidation, threats, and thunder, and the Arabs used to say: It thunders and flashes, meaning threat and menace. Thunder in dreams also indicates good promises and generous orders, because it is one of the orders of the King of the Clouds to rise up and be generous to whomever it is sent to and sent to. Thunder In the dream, it indicates the drums of war. Clouds in this interpretation mean soldiers. Lightning symbolizes weapons, objects, flags, and rain in the dream. Thunder indicates war, symbolizing bloodshed, and lightning in this scene. The interpretation shows the horrors of war and its seriousness. Whoever sees thunder in the sky receives Orders from the ruler or authority, and thunder also symbolizes the messages that the ruler sends to the ruled. Whoever sees in his dream thunder accompanied by rain, and the world is in need of it, then the dream refers to beneficial rain or dates that the fortuneteller will be rewarded or benefit from. Thunder could be In a dream it is good news, because in waking life rain gives good news to people. If the dreamer or vision person is someone who is harmed by rain, such as a traveler, a builder, and others, then this is his interpretation of real rain in waking life that can harm or spoil what he did or did. . It is difficult for the viewer. Or it was flooded by rain. Thunder in the summer indicates an unexpected event for the fortuneteller and is a warning against making wrong or inappropriate decisions. If the dreamer sees lightning with thunder, then the sign of thunder is confirmed in what appears, and if the thunder indicates rain, then the dream will come true soon. May Thunder with lightning in a dream indicates good news that the dreamer receives from the ruler (or a government agency in the present). Thunder without rain in a dream indicates fear, which in some interpretations indicates wars or famines, and the dream may indicate natural disasters and bad events. Others that the dreamer may not experience or be affected by, but he may see or be affected by. It leaves a little despair and sadness in him. Seeing thunder in a dream sometimes indicates spending or paying off debts, and thunder in a sick person’s dream indicates recovery, and in a prisoner’s or his family’s dream it means innocence and release. Thunder, lightning, and rain indicate the traveler’s fear and lack of security in his journey. It was also said: Thunder is a policeman or a great one that aids the dreamer, assists him, or is the reason for his salvation. Thunder without lightning indicates murder, cunning, lies, falsehoods, and great slander. The loud or loud sound of thunder in a dream indicates quarrels, disagreements, or loud and sterile disagreements that leave strife and disagreements. Source of the book The Big Dream Interpretation / Chapter Thirty-Eight / To interpret the sky, the air, the night, the day, the wind, the rain, the rain, the eclipse, the earthquake, the lightning, the thunder, the rainbow, the sun, the moon, the planets, the clouds, the hail, and the snow. Interpretation of thunder in a dream according to Al-NabulsiIf there is thunder in the dream Without rain, this indicates fear. Thunder promised and a man feared it. Thunder can indicate good times and great solutions. It can refer to the sounds of drums. If the dreamer hears Ra

Thunder in dreams also indicates good promises and generous orders, because it is one of the orders of the King of the Clouds to rise up and be generous to whomever it is sent to and sent to. Thunder In the dream, it indicates the drums of war. Clouds in this interpretation mean soldiers. Lightning symbolizes weapons, objects, flags, and rain in the dream. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about seeing circumcision in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of the dream of seeing circumcision in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Circumcision in a dream is one of the good dreams that indicate purity, staying away from disobedience and sins, repentance and returning to God. Circumcision is the removal of the reproductive organ, as you see circumcision in a dream, but the dream certainly differs from one person to another. Male circumcision is important because there are many indicators, and these are the signs that indicate circumcision in a dream. Circumcision is purification, purity, piety, good virtues, and protection from stress and pain. The dream of seeing circumcision by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interprets the dream of circumcision as evidence of the dreamer’s purity from sins as a result of good deeds. As for the dreamer’s dream, he did not circumcise in addition to what is prohibited for him. As for seeing the dreamer circumcised and shedding a lot of blood, this is It indicates his purity from sins and following the Sunnah of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace. If a person sees in a dream that he is circumcised and not circumcised, this indicates a lot of disobedience and abandonment of his worship. And whoever dreams that he is not circumcised, this indicates his illness. And whoever sees that someone has circumcised him He is bleeding profusely, as this indicates his uprightness, uprightness, and distance from immorality. Nabulsi’s dream of seeing circumcision. The researcher Al-Nabulsi believes that the dream of circumcision shows many signs, including: Circumcision in a dream indicates the great joy and pleasure that the dreamer will receive. Circumcision also indicates high status and elevation. For the dreamer: Seeing a refusal to circumcise is evidence that a man will inevitably abandon the Sunnah or abandon a legal duty. Interpretation of a married woman’s circumcision in a dream indicates the menstruation that will happen to her. Seeing circumcision in a dream indicates the death of anxiety, suffering, repentance, integrity, and avoiding immorality. If a young man sees that he is not circumcised, then this It indicates a lack of religion and a lack of worship. If an unmarried young man sees that a girl is circumcised, this indicates that he will marry a just and righteous girl and be happy with her. If a person sees that he has abandoned circumcision or refuses to do it, this indicates his distance from God and many sins and disobedience. Dreaming of a vision Circumcision of a married woman: Seeing a circumcised married woman in a dream is evidence of the health of her married life and her life in general. The interpretation of circumcision in a married woman’s dream is that her children and husband are good in reality. A married woman who sees that she is not circumcised indicates that she is not satisfied with her husband, and that they have gone through a lot of trouble, as is clear. Of her husband’s large debts. As for seeing a married woman circumcising her husband, this indicates that she is helping him correct his situation and helping him get rid of his debts. As for seeing her married children being circumcised as evidence of their education and safety. If a married woman sees that someone has circumcised her husband, this indicates On the righteousness of her husband, his staying away from immorality, avoiding major sins, her happiness with him, and the stability of her married life. Interpretation of the fear of female genital mutilation in a dream is evidence of the instability of her life. Seeing the circumcision of children in a married woman’s dream and the maggot in this case indicates solace and the death of worries. And justice for children. If a married woman sees that she is afraid of circumcision, this may indicate that her life is faltering

title: Interpretation of a dream about menstruation

preview.html: Through today's article in the Encyclopedia, we present to you the interpretation of seeing menstruation in a dream, as every month a woman experiences what is known as menstruation, which is the period in which she suffers from severe hormonal changes, as well as severe changes. Mood, and this period often occupies the minds of women, whether they are single to know whether the ovulation process is taking place correctly or there is some defect, or for a married woman to conclude that pregnancy, so this dream is one of the dreams that occupied her. He often occupied it during sleep, so let us now learn about the interpretation of this dream in detail, from the following lines. The symbol of menstruation in a dream. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of seeing menstruation in a dream, that it is a sign of great goodness that the dreamer will experience in reality. Menstruation is an amount of bad blood, Its descent in a dream is evidence of getting rid of worries and problems that disturb life in reality. Likewise, seeing blood is a sign of the beginning of a new phase filled with happiness and comfort, God willing. Ibn Sirin adds that menstruation in a dream can be good news for the dreamer that he will get rid of the tense and stressful situation that He was living it. In some cases, this dream is evidence of the dreamer’s ability to achieve many of the dreams and desires that she was waiting for. Perhaps menstrual blood is a sign of the great gains that the woman will achieve in life. The color of black blood in a dream does not bode well, as it is a sign that A woman is exposed to many problems and crises in her life. Seeing menstrual blood in a dream is for one girl. Since the unmarried girl is very concerned about the date of her menstruation and preparing for it, her dream may be a reflection of the state of stress and tension that she is experiencing in reality. But if this topic does not concern her at all, For her, menstruation is a sign of her marriage or engagement in the near future, God willing. But Al-Nabulsi differs in the interpretation of this dream. He believes that for a girl who sees menstruation in a dream, her dream is evidence that she is committing many sins, and God knows best. And if she is cleansed of that blood This dream is evidence of her repentance and return to God Almighty. Menstruation in a married woman’s dream. Menstruation in a married woman’s dream is considered a sign of the great goodness that she will obtain in life, whether it is her or her husband. If she wants to become pregnant, this dream promises her that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. Either if the color of the blood is black, or you feel tired in the dream as a result of the bleeding. This dream is evidence of the many problems and issues that she suffers from in her married life. If a married woman sees a dream of menstrual blood as she reaches menopause. This vision is evidence that he is an active and coming personality. The disappearance of menstrual blood from a woman in a dream is a sign that she always needs someone to take care of her and care about her feelings. Seeing menstrual blood on clothes in a dream for a married woman is a reflection of the state of tension and extreme tension that the woman is suffering from at that time. This dream is also evidence that The dreamer cannot organize her life, because she is in a state

title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen for a married, single, and pregnant woman

preview.html: Seeing hair cut in a dream is an annoying vision, especially since many dream interpreters see it as a harmless vision, but what we would like to point out is that the interpretation of the vision is not stable in all cases, it can be positive for some and negative for others, so we will take into account all What has been reported by dream interpreters in interpreting this vision. Interpretation of the dream of a fish in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi in detail. Interpretation of the vision of cutting hair in a dream for a single girl. Among the most prominent meanings of the dream of cutting hair in a dream for a girl who has never been married, we mention the following, according to what was reported by the most prominent interpreters Dreams: One of the meanings of the vision is that the girl with the dream is going through a stage full of problems and difficult experiences that she cannot bear without finding useful solutions for them. The single woman is trying to change the things that affect her life, and this change will be for the better, God willing, if she sees that she is cutting her hair and styling it in a beautiful way. The vision can mean that the girl will get rid of emotional problems and disagreements, while changing the course for the better, and she can also enter into a new love relationship that ends with a formal engagement. The girl dreams that she feels fear and dread without security, and a feeling of anxiety about events or things, if she sees someone cutting her hair and recognizes him. The dreamer gets rid of the problems that concern her in her life, while obtaining a living and great happiness, if she sees that she is hurting herself in a dream. The appearance of a separation in the life of a single person, or the failure of flirtation and emotional life, if the haircut in the dream is long and beautiful. Dream interpreters believe A girl who cuts tangled hair in a dream will get rid of the many problems that existed in her life in the previous period. Al-Osaimi believes that a girl cutting her hair in a dream is a sign of ending the relationship with her fiancé or lover once and for all. If the unmarried girl’s hair is soft and long and she cuts it In a dream, this may be one of the signs that this girl has missed a good opportunity in her life and may not make it up again. Cutting damaged hair in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that this girl will get rid of the bad friends present in her life during this period. Interpretation of a dream about breakfast in The month of Ramadan in a dream. Reasons for shaving hair in a dream for a man and its meaning. Seeing a man cutting his hair in a dream is strange to him, as he cuts his hair constantly throughout his life, and this dream has the following indicators according to dream interpreters: The dreamer is trying to get rid of some restrictions and obstacles in his real life because of... Insomnia and fatigue that it causes in reality. The dreamer’s debts will be paid soon, with his financial situation changing for the better, God willing, which means solving problems related to money in general. The dreamer has undergone radical changes in his professional or emotional life, but when he sees a hand passing over the hair of the head, this It indicates this man’s desire to establish an emotional relationship with someone he knows. Dream interpreters confirm that the man who sees himself shaving his hair in a dream will get rid of the worries and sorrows that dominated him in the previous days. Shaving the hair

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cactus in a dream

preview.html: Aloe Vera in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Imam Al-Sadiq narrated that seeing Aloe Vera in a dream can be a harbinger of hearing good news and perhaps paying off debts. Seeing Aloe Vera in most cases is a sign of relief from anxiety and getting rid of the problems and fears that the dreamer suffers from in his life. Eating Aloe Vera in a dream indicates the strength of the dreamer's faith and his closeness to God and what was revealed in the Holy Qur’an and the Sunnah of His Prophet, and God knows best. She also indicated that smearing the body with Aloe Vera in a dream is a cure for diseases and deliverance from many pains. The interpretation of seeing Aloe Vera planted on graves in a dream is one of the visions that indicate charity and good deeds that a person does. Interpretation of a dream about Aloe Vera for a single woman Seeing Aloe Vera in a dream for a single woman and planting it indicates that good things will happen to her in her coming life, and God knows best. Seeing Aloe Vera in a dream for an unmarried woman also means kindness and blessings in her coming life. And seeing a girl in her dream with a fang and a thorn infecting her is good news that she will have a lot of food in her life and great progress towards success and achieving goals and desires, God willing I know. Interpretation of a dream about cactus for a married woman. Cactus in a dream for a married woman is good news for a married woman and the arrival of abundant sustenance for her and her husband. Seeing a married woman sleeping while holding a cactus plant in her hand indicates the strength of that woman’s faith and her patience with what has befallen her, and God knows best. Seeing a woman in a dream eating cactus indicates loyalty and love for her husband and children, and God knows best. Seeing a large amount of cactus in a married woman’s dream is good news for her, her husband and her home, with a lot of sustenance and goodness that they will receive in their coming life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about cactus for a divorced woman When a divorced woman sees herself in a dream planting an cactus plant, this is the beginning of comfort, calm and moral and psychological stability in her life. Seeing a cactus in a dream for a divorced woman generally means kindness, sustenance, blessing and entering many happy and joyful stages. Seeing oneself being pricked by cactus thorns in a dream is one of the visions that indicate that one is exposed to some troubles and plots in his life. Seeing cactus in a dream for a pregnant woman Eating cactus in a woman’s dream Pregnancy indicates a natural birth that does not give birth to us, fatigue and problems. Also, seeing a pregnant woman in her sleep holding a cactus without being affected by wounds, this is good news that she will give birth to a healthy child who does not suffer from any problems or diseases, and God knows best. Cutting cactus in a dream The interpretation of seeing a cactus cut in a dream and then getting a thorn in it is evidence that the dreamer is exposed to many problems and dangers. Seeing cactus wounds in a dream also means unpleasant events and bad omens and also indicates death. Cactus thorns in a dream Cleaning cactus thorns in a dream indicates that the dreamer will get rid of some evil people in his near life. Hair oil with cactus in a dream Seeing cactus in a dream for a sick person is one of the desirable visions and a sign of
